reviewComments: No food. Not good service. Very laid back. Too much for me. I like to mingle and make friends. Eat before you go or take it with you.
We found this great place after a server at Gumbas Pizza place in Blairsden (great, too!) told us it was basically across the road. I actually had one of their beers with the... read more
Chill with a beer, toss the beanbags, throw a disc or play disc golf. Very good beer and a nice outdoorsy area to relax with comfy wood furniture. Cheers to that!
